column4: Yah i keep XP and Ubuntu together, Lappie, i have some experience with that, so you can ask any questions away about it. note that installing Windows after Linux will destroy GRUB, so keep an Ubuntu Live CD near ya
is there any way to get back grub after it got destroyed by installing windows? or should i install ubuntu all over again?
Boot from a livecd, do "grub-install /dev/sda1" (or whatever). Done
Err, /dev/sda, sorry, must be installed on top of the drive
Well, there are partitions (/dev/sda1, /dev/sda2) and drives (/dev/sda, /dev/sdb, etc)
but wine doesn't work for many windows applications.
my firefox doesn't freeze, just says can't connect to 127.0.0.1
Hm. Running no server i belive? :D
Huh, VPN is working for me
Did you hit the unlock button? %)
but all the buttons are disabled in mine. i want to import settings from a .vpn file. there doesn't seem to be any unlock button!
yeah! the unlock button is supposed to be a key icon at the bottom rit? it's not there! :(
